data.text: @SteveBenjaminSC @usmayors Good so you're against the death tax, capital gains taxes and the corporate income tax too?
@usmayors #SALT is one of six original federal tax deductions and has prevented taxpayers from paying double taxes since 1913. #NoDoubleTaxation
@usmayors Many middle-income homeowners will see their taxes go up - not down - under the current tax reform framework. #NoDoubleTaxation
